entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 03:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
